attributes.action: Increase number of guests allowed at weddings from 15 to at least 30
attributes.additional_details: The Wedding industry should not have to suffer if social distancing can be observed. It is more than apparent that social distancing is not practised at public places of leisure such as bars and pubs. If one can visit a large pub for several hours mixing with other households, guidelines for weddings should be reconsidered.
attributes.background: Wedding ceremonies and celebrations are a vital part of society. Many believe the maximum number of guests authorised at wedding ceremonies should be increased. The number of guests permitted at weddings should be calculated according to venue capacity. Providing social distancing can be adhered.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend the limit for weddings to 30 with COVID 19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552039

Increase Number of Guests Permitted at Weddings, according to Venue Capacity: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329339
